text: The 2010 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards were held on May 9, 2010, at the Tennis Indoor Senayan in Tanah Abang, Central Jakarta, and hosted by Luna Maya, Olga Syahputra, Amel Carla and Choky Sitohang. 2010 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards held again retrieved on 2010-04-07 The ceremony awards held the theme for "Toyland". Agnes Monica, Afgan, Cinta Laura, and Raffi Ahmad led the nominations with two categories. ==Winners and nominees== Winners are listed on bold. List the winners of 2010 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards retrieved on 2010-05-10 {| class=wikitable style="width="100%" |- !Favorite Male Singer !Favorite Female Singer |- | valign= "top" | * Afgan ** Saykoji ** Vidi Aldiano ** Anang Hermansyah | valign= "top" | * Gita Gutawa ** Agnes Monica ** Cinta Laura ** Bunga Citra Lestari |- !Favorite Actor !Favorite Actress |- | valign= "top" | * Dude Herlino ** Adly Fairuz ** Teuku Wisnu ** Raffi Ahmad | valign= "top" | * Nikita Willy ** Luna Maya ** Shireen Sungkar ** Cinta Laura |- !Favorite Cartoon !Favorite Band |- | valign= "top" | * SpongeBob SquarePants ** Tom and Jerry ** Naruto ** Upin & Ipin | valign= "top" | * Vierra ** Ungu ** ST 12 ** D'Masiv |- !Favorite Duo/Group !Favorite Athlete |- | valign= "top" | * RAN ** Duo Maia ** Pasto ** T2 | valign= "top" | * Denny Sumargo ** Taufik Hidayat ** Bambang Pamungkas ** Chris John |- !Favorite Presenter !Indonesian Star Wannabe Award |- | valign= "top" | * Choky Sitohang ** Raffi Ahmad ** Olga Syahputra ** Amel Carla | valign= "top" | * Cinta Laura ** Bunga Citra Lestari ** Agnes Monica ** Choky Sitohang |- !colspan= "2" | Slime Star |- | valign= "top" colspan= "2" | * Agnes Monica |- |} ==References== Category:2010 film awards Category:2010 television awards Category:2010 music awards Category:2010 in Indonesian television
title: 2010 Nickelodeon Indonesia Kids' Choice Awards
